body: @hildo please go ahead, it's your task now, keep [this](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html) in mind, and don't hesitate to ask any technical questions you may have

@hildo The budget of this task is **30 mins**. This is exactly how much time will be compensated, when the task is completed. Read about our [Definition of Done](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/15/definition-of-done.html)

@hildo you're holding this ticket for 10 days already. If it's not finished (and closed) in the next 48 hours, it will be re-assigned to someone else, see [No Obligations](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/13/no-obligations-principle.html) principle

@hildo you've been working with this task for too long. I'm sorry, but I'll assign someone else. Please stop working with it. See our [no obligations](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/13/no-obligations-principle.html) principle
@sanai56967 the issue is yours, please help

issue.title: let's star every project we touch

repository.name: rultor

issue.body: Let's add a star to every project we work with, just for fun

body: @sanai56967 you're holding this task for 10 days already
@dmarkov sorry, I am a littel busy at the moment. If it is possible to wait then I'll look at the issue. Otherwise please reassign it to someone else.

@sanai56967 it takes too long. Usually, we expect any task to be finished in less than a week. I'll assign someone else. Please stop working with it right now. See our [no obligations](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/13/no-obligations-principle.html) principle
